weave.servlets

Class DataService

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        • weave.servlets.WeaveServlet
          • weave.servlets.DataService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig, IWeaveEntityService

    public class DataService
extends WeaveServlet
implements IWeaveEntityService
    This class connects to a database and gets data uses xml configuration file to get connection/query info
    Author:
    Andy Dufilie
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • findEntityIds

        public int[] findEntityIds(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> publicMetadata,
                  java.lang.String[] wildcardFields)
                    throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Description copied from interface: IWeaveEntityService
        Gets an Array of entity IDs with matching public metadata.
        Specified by:
        findEntityIds in interface IWeaveEntityService
        Parameters:
        publicMetadata - Public metadata to search for.
        wildcardFields - A list of field names in publicMetadata that should be treated as search strings with wildcards '?' and '*' for single-character and multi-character matching, respectively.
        Returns:
        An Array of IDs matching the search criteria.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

                                       java.lang.String valueSearch)
                                         throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Description copied from interface: IWeaveEntityService
        Finds matching values for a public metadata field.
        Specified by:
        findPublicFieldValues in interface IWeaveEntityService
        Parameters:
        fieldName - The name of the public metadata field to search.
        valueSearch - A search string.
        Returns:

      • getColumn

        public AttributeColumnData getColumn(java.lang.Object columnId,
                            double minParam,
                            double maxParam,
                            java.lang.Object[] sqlParams)
                              throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        This retrieves the data and the public metadata for a single attribute column.
        Parameters:
        columnId - Either an entity ID (int) or a Map specifying public metadata values that uniquely identify a column.
        minParam - Used for filtering numeric data
        maxParam - Used for filtering numeric data
        sqlParams - Specifies parameters to be used in place of '?' placeholders that appear in the SQL query for the column.
        Returns:
        The column data.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
